Those devastating words from Emilia to Subaru open up a terrifying truth: that matters with the Witch`s Cult are far from over. The party containing Rem, Crusch, and the head of the White Whale is beset by two new Sins: Sin Archbishop of Gluttony, Rye, and Sin Archbishop of Greed, Regulus. Together they devastate Crusch`s forces and, despite Rem`s defiance, eat the memories of both Rem and Crusch and the name of Rem as well, which causes almost everyone to forget her. When Subaru finds out upon everyone`s return to Crusch`s mansion, he tries to Return by Death so that he can stop this, only to discover that his save point has advanced past it...","genres":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy","Harem","Magic","Psychological","Romance","Thriller"],"country":"JP","total_episodes":13,"status":"ended","network":null,"anime_type":"tv","ratings":{"simkl":{"rating":8.4,"votes":509},"mal":{"rating":8.5,"votes":375085,"rank":122}},"trailers":[{"name":null,"youtube":"41Gj4Dri8wo","size":720},{"name":null,"youtube":"94_4zvvXuUM","size":720},{"name":null,"youtube":"PzOr_5bSdQU","size":720},{"name":null,"youtube":"qCXlrNYghHs","size":720}],"users_recommendations":[{"title":"Steins;Gate","en_title":null,"year":2011,"poster":"78\/7899727e67e975d","anime_type":"tv","users_percent":"30%","users_count":3,"ids":{"simkl":38960,"slug":"steinsgate"}},{"title":"Shinseiki Evangelion","en_title":"Neon Genesis Evangelion","year":1995,"poster":"23\/2382329256abd44","anime_type":"tv","users_percent":"20%","users_count":2,"ids":{"simkl":41254,"slug":"shinseiki-evangelion"}},{"title":"Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica","en_title":"Puella Magi Madoka Magica","year":2011,"poster":"76\/76665aa51e38622","anime_type":"tv","users_percent":"10%","users_count":1,"ids":{"simkl":36433,"slug":"mahou-shoujo-madoka-magica"}},{"title":"Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o!","en_title":"Konosuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!","year":2016,"poster":"44\/4441364da533631ad","anime_type":"tv","users_percent":"10%","users_count":1,"ids":{"simkl":520074,"slug":"kono-subarashii-sekai-ni-shukufuku-o"}},{"title":"Boku dake ga Inai Machi","en_title":"Erased","year":2016,"poster":"31\/3150974789b5b8ac2","anime_type":"tv","users_percent":"10%","users_count":1,"ids":{"simkl":503490,"slug":"boku-dake-ga-inai-machi"}},{"title":"Higurashi no Naku Koro ni","en_title":"When They Cry -
